FIELDS.LAT: Latitude in ddmm.mmmm format, leading zeros are inserted
FIELDS.LON: Longitude in dddmm.mmmm format, leading zeros are inserted
FIELDS.GPS_VALID: GPS quality validity, 0: position fix unavailable, 1: valid position fix, SPS mode, 2: valid position fix, DGPS mode
FIELDS.ALT: Mean sea level altitude (-9999.9 ~ 17999.9) in meter
FIELDS.STAT: A: data valid, V: data invalid
FIELDS.MODE: M: Manual, forced to operate in 2D/3D mode (GSA), A: Automatic, allowed to automatically switch 2D/3D(GSA), Autonomous mode(VTG), N: not valid(VTG), D: Differential mode(VTG), E: Estimated (Dead reckoning) mode (VTG)
FIELDS.SEQ_NO: Sequence number of current GSV message
FIELDS.SAT_ID: GPS: 01-32, SBAS (PRN minus 87): 33~64, GLONASS (64 plus slit numbers): 65~96, QZSS: 192~197, BeiDou (BD PRN): 01~37, max. 5 satellites are included in each GSV sentence
FIELDS.SNR: C/N0 in dB (00~99), Null when not tracking
FIELDS.SPD_K: Speed over ground, in kilometers per hour (0000.0 ~ 1800.0)
